org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class SchedulePattern

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.SchedulePattern

public class SchedulePattern
extends java.lang.Object

A SchedulePattern defines a simple pattern that can be used rather than using the Cron Expressions.

Author:
bbeaumont

getScheduleType

public int getScheduleType()
Get the schedule type, which is a unique identifier for the predefined schedule. The type number must be greater than zero.

Returns:
Returns the scheduleType.
